detail_desc: Playsuit in a cotton weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and a tie belt at the waist.
Bikini briefs in soft stretch fabric with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a round neck and flared, asymmetric hem. The top is made from recycled polyester.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Flip-flops in imitation patent leather with metal and plastic stone decorations and rubber soles.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband in sturdier fabric and a high cut at the back.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Padded gilet with a detachable, pile-lined hood, zip with a chin guard at the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline front and back, 3/4-length sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
High-waisted suit trousers in softly draping twill with side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button, and wide, straight legs with creases.
Imitation leather clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x27 cm.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Joggers in soft, lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication, a small frill trim and decorative drawstring at the waist. Small embroidery detail in glittery thread at the top, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a flap back pocket with a press-stud. Mesh inner shorts.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Metal earrings with an asymmetric disc at the top and an arch with asymmetric pendants and plastic beads. Width approx. 4 cm, length approx. 8 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with a wrapover front with ties at one side, and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with a wrapover front, tie at the waist and frills down the front and at the cuffs.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in jersey with a deep neckline at the back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. Faux wrapover with decorative buttons and a slit at the front, and wide, elasticated ribbing at the waist. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Soft, non-wired bra in jersey made from a modal blend. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and wide elastic at the hem.

Long-sleeved dress in lace made from a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a grosgrain bow and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and skirt.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a small frill trim, drawstring at the top and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Pleated, calf-length crêpe skirt with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with an overlocked hem. Regular waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Padded jacket in windproof and water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, a high collar and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Partly lined.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.

Tunic in a viscose and cupro weave with a collar and deep V-neck with a draped knot detail at the front. Seam at the waist, a wrapover lower section and long sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and tapered legs.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, and pockets in the side seams.
Ballet pumps with an appliqué and an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with decorative stitching and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long dress in an airy, slightly crinkled weave. Small stand-up collar with narrow smocking and a small frill trim, narrow, detachable ties at the waist and an airy, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in a soft knit with a round, slightly wider neckline, gently dropped shoulders and rounded hem.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.

Short, boxy jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Set with a skirt and top in cotton. Skirt in a textured knit with frill-trimmed straps. Top in patterned jersey with long sleeves.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Short coat in a textured weave containing some wool with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Large patch pockets with a flap, and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved Henley top in waffled cotton jersey with a button placket and an open chest pocket in jersey with a small fabric appliqué.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre with a lace back section, low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Printed jersey vest top.
Long, sleeveless dress in viscose jersey with frilled, elasticated shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a wide neckline, long sleeves and wide cuffs with slits.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. One open chest pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.

Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, notch lapels, defined shoulders and long sleeves. Draped detail to define the waist, shaping seams at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish and no buttons.
Jumper in a slub cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and visible seams at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with fringing at the hem, short sleeves and a print motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and removable insoles, and chunky soles.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cap in cotton twill with elastication at the back.
V-neck blouse in soft viscose twill with long sleeves, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
